cause.description:
Laura Lee Colon is an intern at the Center for Creative Media. Her internship here lasts 2 years and it costs $1500 a month to remain here. This covers housing and food, transporatation to and from various large Christian stadium events, and Professional Encounters they take to Los Angeles and New York City. At the Center for Creative Media she is being trained spiritually to stand strong in a secular envoirnment as well as professionally in order to pursue her calling to be salt and light in the media industry. While she is training she is also able to use her talents in ministry to help reach thousands of teenagers each year with the gospel.
1. Laura Lee Colon must raise $30,000 in order to continue in this ministry
cause.mission: Help young Christian woman train for her calling
cause.name: Fundraising
